Title: Model-View-ViewModel interactions
Description: This project contains custom behaviours (see System.Windows.Interactivity for more information) which may be usefull during WPF MVVM development (such as CloseWindowFromViewModel)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project contains custom behaviours (see System.Windows.Interactivity for more information) which may be usefull during WPF MVVM development (such as CloseWindowFromViewModel)


Model-View-ViewModel interactions is considered to be a set of interactions (behaviour, triggers, etc) that may be helpful for WPF/Silverlight MVVM development. This project is based on System.Windows.Interactivity assembly and MVVM light toolkit (both included).

Please feel free to leave your comments about this project and what 'behaviors' would be interesting for you.
